properties.focal_length: double: Focal length of the camera
properties.image_width: int: Width in pixels of the generated image
properties.image_height: int: Height in pixels of the generated image
properties.fov: double: Field of view of the camera in radians

position.r: double: radial coordinate of the camera
position.theta: double: polar angle of the camera
position.phi: double: azimuthal angle of the camera

up_vector: double: x component of the up direction of the camera
double: y component of the up direction of the camera
double: z component of the up direction of the camera
camera_dir: double: x component of the direction of the camera
double: y component of the direction of the camera
double: z component of the direction of the camera
camera_velocity: double: r component of the 4-velocity of the camera
double: theta component of the 4-velocity of the camera
double: phi component of the 4-velocity of the camera

metric.name: str: Name of the metric to use

parameters: any potential parameters for the metric

simulation_settings.n_steps: int: maximum number of steps to take in the simulation
simulation_settings.initial_step_size: double: The initial step size in the integration
simulation_settings.error_tolerance: double: The error tolerance for the integrator

background: str: The path to the background image we want to use
output_file: str: The path to the output file we want to write to
render_disk: bool: Whether to render an accretion disk or not
